definition: an abrupt and unceremonious dismissal, to perform a ceremonious bow
details:
noun
- an abrupt and unceremonious dismissal
= synonyms: congee
- formal permission to depart
= example: formal permission to depart
= synonyms: congee
- (architecture) a concave molding
= synonyms: congee
verb
- to perform a ceremonious bow
= synonyms: congee
